Text:
seriously?
there used to be a reason to pack files like this but i believe that time has passed...

There's always a non-rar option available for this show so I encourage everyone to encourage the distribution of non-rar'd torrents by NOT downloading rar'd torrents like this one.

I have zero use for rar'd torrents and feel like I've been violated when I have no other choice.  Thankfully that's not the case this time.
